authentication.title: WELCOME BACK!
authentication.subtitle: Sign in to access your personalized dashboard and services.
authentication.phoneDescription: * This is your phone number registered with us.
authentication.phoneErrorLength: Phone number must be at least 10 characters long.
authentication.phoneErrorFormat: Please enter a valid phone number.
authentication.usernameError: Username must be at least 5 characters long.
authentication.usernameErrorFormat: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
authentication.passwordError: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
authentication.passwordComplexityError: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.

qrManagement.title: QR Management
qrManagement.description: Manage your QR codes for easy access to services.
qrManagement.createDescription: Create a new QR code for your area or table.

additionalField.title: Additional Fields
additionalField.description: Add any additional fields you need embedded in the QR code.

addAreaField.title: Add Area
addAreaField.description: Add area if not already created to embed in the QR code.
addAreaField.fieldImageUrlDescription: * Enter the image URL for the area
addAreaField.fieldBranchIdDescription: * Select the branch for this area

addTableField.title: Add Table
addTableField.description: Add table if not already created to embed in the QR code.

table.title: QR Codes Create
table.description: Configure the details for your new QR code.
table.additionalFieldsDescription: Add any additional fields you need embedded in the QR code.

alertDialog.title: Are you sure?
alertDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the table record and remove data from our server.

menuManagement.title: Menu Management
menuManagement.createDescription: Create a new menu item for your restaurant.

createMenuField.name: Menu Item Name
createMenuField.nameDescription: Enter the name of the menu item.
createMenuField.descriptionDescription: Enter a description for the menu item.
createMenuField.categoryNameDescription: Select a category for the menu item.
createMenuField.subCategoryNameDescription: Select a subcategory for the menu item.
createMenuField.nameError: Menu item name cannot be empty.
createMenuField.sizeError: At least one size must be added.

sizeField.label: Size Fields
sizeField.description: Add sizes for the menu item. Each size can have a different price.
sizeField.name: Size Name

optionField.label: Option Fields
optionField.description: Add options for the menu item. Each option can have a different price.
optionField.name: Option Name

createMenuItemSizeField.name: Size Name
createMenuItemSizeField.priceError: Price must be a non-negative number.

createMenuItemOptionField.name: Option Name
createMenuItemOptionField.priceError: Price must be a non-negative number.

cart.emptyCartDescription: Looks like you haven’t added anything to your cart yet.
cart.removeItemDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this item from your cart?
